import React from "react"; import moment from 'moment' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import SavedPost from "../Pages/savedPost"; import ListType from "../Pages/listType"; export default function ListBookPost(){ const posts = useSelector((state) =>state.post.value) return(
{ posts.map((item) =>(
{ item.avatar ?
:
}
{item.authorName}
{moment(item.createAt).fromNow()}

{item.title}.

{item.description}.

View
)) }
) }
